description:
Socket an Artifact's [slot_trait] Trait Slot with this item to gain this trait:\n\nMaster of Efreets:
When your creatures afflict enemies with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BURNED}, the potency of this debuff is increased by 50% for each {RACE_Efreet} fighting on your side. This trait does not stack.
name: Sigil of the Efreet
